text: Hardwicke High School and College is an educational institute in Mysore. The school offers primary, higher primary, high school, and pre-university level education. ==History== Formerly known as Wesleyan High School and Methodist Mission High School, Hardwicke High School and Pre-University College was founded in 1840 during the rule of Maharaja Krishnaraja Wadiyar III. ==Subsidiaries== * Hardwicke Church, Vani Vilas Road, Mysore ==Alumni== * Kuvempu, Kannada Poet ==See also== *List of Heritage Buildings in Mysore ==References== Category:1840 establishments in India Category:Educational institutions established in 1840 Category:High schools and secondary schools in Mysore
title: Hardwick High School and College
